author: Andy F
title: Stunning Views,
text:
We stayed in a Deluxe High Room with a view located on the 47th floor. The views from the room were absolutley amazing and were perfect for our fist trip to New York. The room itself was clean and functional, pillows could be improved on, but the bathroom was lovely with a bath as well as a shower.
All of the staff were very friendly and helpful.
Only complaint was that my credit card was authorised as soon as we got to the hotel and wasnt told how much was being put on it at the time and it was significantly higher than the cost of the room. No major issue just a slight inconvenience as would have used a different card.
Overall loved the hotel and would happily go back.
Room Tip: High rooms are quieter and have the best views See more room tips
